name: Nagasaki Kitty - Japanese Language Edition
description:
Nagasaki Kitty is an educational game based on historical research designed to better inform Western audiences about the atomic bombs. It has been translated as a study tool for intermediate to advanced Japanese language students.

For more information and updates please like and follow on social media

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NagasakiKitty

Twitter: https://twitter.com/nagasaki_kitty

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nagasaki_kitty/
